attributes.action: Stop plans for the Privatisation of Security within HMRC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a time when the government lists national security as one if its main priorities it seems irrational and negligent to hand over such an important function of security within HMRC to a private company whose main priority will be profit. 

Please support our campaign against this privatisation .

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop plans for the Privatisation of Security within HMRC."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19609


Prime Minister's Office
